task: Apply a heading style to the current file
steps: Open the Microsoft Word document called Document11.docx.
Select the text that you want to apply a heading style to.
Click on the 'Home' tab in the ribbon.
In the 'Styles' group, click on the 'Heading 1' style to apply it as a heading.
Verify that the selected text is now formatted with the 'Heading 1' style.
